          <title>
            <string language="en">Mass and weight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse und Gewicht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La masse et poids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Massa e peso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Massa e peso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάζα και βάρος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Masa y peso</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the mass and weight of a cat (top left), a girl (top right), a box (bottom left) and a van (bottom right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kilograms</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">newtons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Masse und das Gewicht 
einer Katze (oberes links), des Mädchens (äußerste Rechte), des 
Kastens (unteres links) und des Packwagens (unteres Recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la masse et le poids 
d'un chat (gauche supérieure), d'une fille (droite supérieure), d'un
cadre (gauche inférieure) et d'un fourgon (droite inférieure).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a massa e o peso de um 
gato (esquerda superior), de uma menina (direita superior), de uma 
caixa (esquerda inferior) e de uma camionete (direita inferior).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la massa ed il peso 
di gatto (parte di sinistra superiore), di ragazza (destra superiore),
di casella (parte di sinistra inferiore) e di furgone (destra 
inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη μάζα και βάρος μιας 
γάτας (κορυφαίο αριστερό), ενός κοριτσιού (κορυφαίο δικαίωμα), 
ενός κιβωτίου (κατώτατο σημείο αριστερά) και ενός φορτηγού 
(κατώτατο δικαίωμα).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la masa y el peso de un
gato (izquierda superior), de una muchacha (la derecha superior), de 
un rectángulo (izquierda inferior) y de una furgoneta (la derecha 
inferior).</string>
          </description>
